Abstrak: The article focuses on the advantage of cyberspace operational graphics on cyber planners and operators in conveying mission-relevant information. Topics discussed include the warfighting domain established by the U.S. Department of Defense (DOD), the control of the skies by the U.S. Air Force since World War II, and the uniqueness of the cyberspace terrain.
Sumber: JFQ: Joint Force Quarterly. 2017 2nd Quarter, Issue 85, p42-49. 8p. 1 Color Photograph, 6 Diagrams, 2 Charts
